column3: str
The House Manderville artisan stands ready to facilitate your augmentation request.<hex:02100103>※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

You approach the House Manderville artisan with a request to augment a different Manderville weapon. The ever-enthusiastic craftsman asks only that you supply him with the necessary chunks of complementary chondrite─a substance which is, of course, only available from a particular merchant for a very particular type of currency.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>※Chunks of complementary chondrite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz–at–Han.

You make the required meteoritic contribution, and are once more blessed to witness a collaboration of artisanal brilliance. Encouraged by Gerolt's grudging praise, the House Manderville artisan bids you call upon him again should you have other armaments you wish to have augmented.

<hex:0208F202FDE3E802E803FF29>Obtain chunks of complementary chondrite<hex:FFF202CA>With <hex:0208F2024CE4E80514FF25><hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03F196020203> and <hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29613020203><hex:FFF2021E><hex:0208F20218E4E80515FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29601020203><hex:FFF201FE><hex:0208F201F8E4E80516FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29602020203><hex:FFF201DE><hex:0208F201D8E4E80517FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29603020203><hex:FFF201BE><hex:0208F201B8E4E80518FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29604020203><hex:FFF2019E><hex:0208F20198E4E80519FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29608020203><hex:FFF2017E><hex:0208F20178E4E8051AFF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29609020203><hex:FFF2015E><hex:0208F20158E4E8051CFF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F2960A020203><hex:FFF2013E><hex:0208F20138E4E8051DFF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F2960B020203><hex:FFF2011E><hex:0208F20118E4E8051FFF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29605020203><hex:FFF0FF><hex:0208F0FAE4E80520FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29607020203><hex:FFF0E1><hex:0208F0DCE4E80521FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29606020203><hex:FFC5><hex:0208C1E4E80522FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F2960C020203><hex:FFA9><hex:0208A5E4E80523FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F2960D020203><hex:FF8D><hex:020889E4E80524FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F2960E020203><hex:FF71><hex:02086DE4E80526FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F2960F020203><hex:FF55><hex:020851E4E80527FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29610020203><hex:FF39><hex:020835E4E80528FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29612020203><hex:FF1D><hex:020819E4E80529FF11><hex:02310DFF05>Item<hex:03F29611020203><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03> in your inventory or Armoury Chest, deliver the chunks of complementary chondrite to the House Manderville artisan<hex:03>.

Please note that upon completing the quest “The Next Mander-level,” you will receive a Manderville weapon for <hex:0208B0E4E9450BFF15>an <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF94><hex:020890E4E9450FFF15>an <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF74><hex:020870E4E94506FF15>an <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF54><hex:020850E4E9451BFF15>an <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF34><hex:020830E4E94522FF15>an <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF14>a <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03>.
Please ensure you have changed to your desired job before speaking with the House Manderville artisan.
What will you do?
Undertake this quest as another job.

Undertake this quest as <hex:0208B0E4E9450BFF15>an <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF94><hex:020890E4E9450FFF15>an <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF74><hex:020870E4E94506FF15>an <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF54><hex:020850E4E9451BFF15>an <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF34><hex:020830E4E94522FF15>an <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:FF14>a <hex:02280EFF09>ClassJob<hex:E9450103><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03>.
Please speak with the House Manderville artisan again when you are ready to undertake this quest.
You have already received <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E802020203> and <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E803020203>. Please change to a different job and speak with the House Manderville artisan again.
You have already received <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E802020203>. Please change to a different job and speak with the House Manderville artisan again.

In order to accept the quest “The Next Mander-level,” please ensure that <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E802020203> and <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E803020203> are either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.
In order to accept the quest “The Next Mander-level,” please ensure that <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E802020203> is either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.
Am I free to perform an augmentation? Why, certainly, <hex:020815E905FF09>Mistress<hex:FF07>Master<hex:03> <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0303>!
You need but contribute the necessary quantity of complementary chondrite, and we can elevate your Manderville weaponry to the next Mander-level, ahahaha! Ahem. Three chunks, if you please.
Chunks of complementary chondrite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz–at–Han.

Yes, that would be <hex:021A020203>three<hex:021A020103> chunks of complementary chondrite, I'm afraid. We wouldn't wish to upset the delicate balance of your armaments with an unproven ratio now, would we?
Chunks of complementary chondrite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz–at–Han.
<sniff> Is that chondrite I smell? Splendid! If you would be so kind as to unbuckle your weaponry...?
Are we ready to proceed, <hex:020815E905FF09>Mistress<hex:FF07>Master<hex:03> <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0303>?
Very good. As for my inner fires, I assure you that they burn hotter than Master Gerolt's furnace. Let us bring the blacksmith and his hammer to bear, shall we?
...An' done! What do ye think o' that, eh?
We've upgraded ye to <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E802020203> an' <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E803020203>!
We've upgraded ye to <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E802020203>!
Another collaborative triumph, Master Gerolt! I feel the more I work at your side, the closer I come towards achieving true mastery!
Hah! Don't be daft, ye trouser-less twit! I've seen better craftsmen in a goblin's nursery!
An' while we're yappin', his lordship made ye do the same “martial meditation” as me, didn't he? What'd he have ye fight, then?
I locked tusks, as it were, with a furious gaja of Saltwind's Welcome.
Y-Ye mean one o' them huge stompin' brutes!? An' ye took it down!?
Yes, though I barely survived with my smallclothes intact...
D-Did ye, now...? <cough> Might be as I was exaggeratin' a bit earlier. Yer a credit to yer craft, so keep at it, all right?
I will, Master Gerolt!
A superlative result as usual, Master Gerolt! I could ask for no finer example to aspire to in my own pursuit of perfection!
Aye, when ye've got the gift like I have, ye can fix up any weapon ye put yer hand to! ...Ye did help a little, o' course.

There you have it, <hex:020815E905FF09>Mistress<hex:FF07>Master<hex:03> <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0303>. Should you have further need of our augmentation services, we are at your beck and call.
All we require is a handful of chondrite and a few moments of your time!
